Okay it is possible to change the language. Its confusing though so i'll try my best to make it simple.
1)go into Risen 2 Data folder.
2)go into ini folder.
3)open configdefault.xml with WordPad (Not NotePad)
4)press ctrl+f(same time) and search "Language"
5) change "russian" to "english" or which ever english you prefer.
6)If you can't save over this file, click Save As and choose Desktop or someplace easy to find it. 
7)Once its saved, delete the xml file in risen 2 folder and cut n paste the file you just saved, as its replacement.

Hope this helps! :D
